ApiKey.description: Gets or sets a Seq API key that authenticates the client to the Seq server.

HealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whetherthe Seq server health check is enabled or not.

ServerUrl.description: Gets or sets the base URL of the Seq server (including protocol and port). E.g. "https://example.seq.com:6789"

Seq.description: Provides the client configuration settings for connecting telemetry to a Seq server.
